snippet: Maryland authorities said Tuesday they will charge a man with disorderly conduct in a cemetery for allegedly urinating on the grave of former Baltimore Ravens owner Art Modell....

headline.print_headline: Man Facing Charges for Urinating on Modell's Grave
headline.main: Man Facing Charges for Urinating on Modell's Grave

lead_paragraph: Maryland authorities said Tuesday they will charge a man with disorderly conduct in a cemetery for allegedly urinating on the grave of former Baltimore Ravens owner Art Modell.
